message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a high-quality item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $180.
I'm really interested in the product, but $180 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $120?
I understand you're on a budget, Bob, but I've got to make a profit. I can do $150, and that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $150 is still a bit high for me. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $110?
I'm trying to find a middle ground, Bob. I can do $140, but I'm not going any lower than that.
